Package dividedAstExport

Class ExpressionConverter

java.lang.Object
dividedAstExport.ExpressionConverter
public class ExpressionConverter extends Object
Manages conversions of configuration expressions in JSON into AST and back -other extraction operations are included
Author:
Jakub Perdek
